segments.text: My doctor says that I need a blood test .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can help you with that . Just have a seat and roll up your left sleeve .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are you taking my blood for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your doctor has requested a check of your white blood count .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What information does that give him ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If your white blood cell count is off , it could signal an infection somewhere in your body .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am putting a tourniquet on your arm to plump up the vein . It will only feel like a little pin prick .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That was it ! Thank you for coming in today .
segments.speaker: S2
